      • getPackageDistribution

        public static int[] getPackageDistribution(int playerCount,
                                           int assistantCount)
        calculate field with all Packages and their sizes index 0 is for the first package...
        Parameters:
        assistantCount - for number of package = fieldsize
        playerCount - to distribute the players over the packages
        Returns:
        a field with all Packages and their sizes

        Returns:
        sum of all absolute players

      • getLocalizedMessage

        public static java.lang.String getLocalizedMessage(java.lang.String key)
        Gets the message from the .properties to the key using Spring methods. If Spring is not set up properly yet -> messageSource = null [would be set by init()] fallback to old function
        Parameters:
        key - the key from the .properties file
        Returns:
        localized message if a .properties file is existing for the actual locale

      • print

        public static void print(java.lang.String message,
                         int type)
        Prints a well-formatted output to console [log] with message message and type
        Parameters:
        message - message to be printed
        type - 0 = INFO
        1 = WARNING
        2 = ERROR
